features: 【Ajustable Brightness & 3 colors Lights】: Nacvmry Hollywood lighted vanity mirror surrounded by 15pc LED bulbs,with warm liht/day light /cold light three-tone settings,Ajustable brightnees is meet to your personal makeup requriement.

【Large Size & USB outlet】: Nacvmry large hollywood makeup mirror has a perfect large size（22.8"x 18.1"）,It's large enough to show your makeup, suitable for dresser and bedroom.USB charge port（12V,1A) on the side allows to charge your smart phone or other USB devices.

【Touch Screen Memory Function & 10X Magnification Modes】: Nacvmry vanity mirror with smart design.The left M button is used to change the mode of the light, the middle button is used to turn on and off, and the right P button is used to adjust the brightness. Memory function can keep your light setting like you last use. Lighted makeup mirror has 10X panels magnifying and wide-angle viewing; see clearly your face and make a flawless makeup, suitable for desk makeup and handheld use.

【Detachable Mirror Base & Hanging setting】: The Large makeup mirror is versatile since it can be placed on a makeup desk or hung on The Wall.It with detachabled base and two back hole for nail.1.Removing mirror base with a screwdriver.2.Knocking two nails on the wall.3.hanging mirror on the wall.

【Quality warranty & After-sale service】: We promise you no-reason return for three month & Lifetime after-sales service.Pleas don't hesitate to contact us if there are any questions with your vanity mirror,you will get respond within 24 hours.
body.description: Nacvmry Large Hollywood Vanity Mirror, Vanity Mirror with 10x Lens, Dimmble Led Bulb, 3 Color Light Modes. Dream Vanity Mirror:The Hollywood vanity mirror is a must-have professional makeup aid for celebrities and makeup artists, and can also be installed at home. The frame of the makeup vanity mirror is made of high-quality tinplate, and the ivory white color is more stable and elegant. The vanity mirror allows you to complete your perfect makeup while enjoying the song, giving you a star-like feel and the vanity of your dreams. The Hollywood Vanity Mirror features adjustable brightness and 3 light colors (Cool White,Warm White,Warm Yellow) to help you create a flawless professional look. Product Information: Product Name:10x Lens Vanity Mirror Frame: Tinplate Mirror Color: Ivory white Hanging:Support Voltage Input: 110-230V Voltage Output: 12V 1A Light:Cool White/ Warm White / Warm Yellow Bulb: 15/18*3W LED dimmable bulbs Mirror Size: 58*46cm Base:Detachable base Product Weight: 13Pounds Wall Mounted or Tabletop Nacvmry Large hollywood vanity makeup mirror is also space saver for your dressing table.It with two back hole for nail,can easily hang on the wall! Dimmable LED light bulbs Nacvmry Large hollywood vanity makeup mirror is dimmable light bulbs save power, Beautiful and Durable,and last up to 50,000 hours.The bulbs temperature is safe and not hot.It also remains stable over long periods of use.Protect you and your eyes. USB Chargering Port Nacvmry Large hollywood vanity makeup mirror is power outlet with USB port is designed on the side of Nacvmry vanity mirror.It is convenient to charge your mobile phone or other USB device while making up. 10x Lens Function Nacvmry Large hollywood vanity makeup mirror is exquisite makeup is one of the necessary conditions for a happy life every day. Hollywood make-up mirror is equipped with 10x Lens, making you a perfect makeup!
